channel.title: Comments on: Why is it called “Project Pink Day”?
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: Our October “Pink” Tribute | Project Pink Day
item.dc:creator: Our October “Pink” Tribute | Project Pink Day
item.description: […] reassure the person asking the question – that we are fine and that the reason for the name Project Pink Day is because our daughter, Zoe, associated the pink Saturdays on the calendar with the days that […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Kim Smith
item.dc:creator: Kim Smith
item.description: Bravo! You are my heroes and I have so much respect for your values. Family is everything. Get ready for the best year of your lives! Love you guys! Kim
item.content:encoded:
Bravo! You are my heroes and I have so much respect for your values. Family is everything. Get ready for the best year of your lives! Love you guys!
Kim

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Reto
item.dc:creator: Reto
item.description: OMG! This is the best idea ever!!! I am so jealous. Typing this post from our 4 weeks vacation in Australia which is coming to the end. Literally sitting in our hotel room in Sydney, just 30 minutes before departure....back home...back to reality. Wishing you ONLY the VERY BEST and ENJOY!! Reto
item.content:encoded:
OMG! This is the best idea ever!!! I am so jealous. Typing this post from our 4 weeks vacation in Australia which is coming to the end. Literally sitting in our hotel room in Sydney, just 30 minutes before departure….back home…back to reality.
Wishing you ONLY the VERY BEST and ENJOY!!
Reto
